ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This packages is intended to make it easy to create D3 JavaScript network, tree, dendrogram, and Sankey graphs from R using data frames. !!! NOTE: Active development has moved to the networkD3 package. !!!

This packages is intended to make it easy to create D3 JavaScript network, tree, dendrogram, and Sankey graphs from R using data frames. !!! NOTE: Active development has moved to the networkD3 package. !!!

name: r-d3network
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.5.2.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-d3network
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/d3Network_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/d3Network/d3Network_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5c798dc0c87c6d574abb7c1f1903346e6b0fec8adfd1df7aef5e4f9e7e3a09be

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-plyr
    - r-rjson
    - r-whisker
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-plyr
    - r-rjson
    - r-whisker

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('d3Network')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('d3Network')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://christophergandrud.github.io/d3Network/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: 'This packages is intended to make it easy to create D3 JavaScript network, tree,
    dendrogram, and Sankey graphs from R using data frames. !!! NOTE: Active development
    has moved to the networkD3 package. !!!'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: d3Network
# Title: Tools for creating D3 JavaScript network, tree, dendrogram, and Sankey graphs from R
# Description: This packages is intended to make it easy to create D3 JavaScript network, tree, dendrogram, and Sankey graphs from R using data frames. !!! NOTE: Active development has moved to the networkD3 package. !!!
# Version: 0.5.2.1
# Date: 2015-01-31
# Author: Christopher Gandrud
# Maintainer: Christopher Gandrud <christopher.gandrud@gmail.com>
# URL: http://christophergandrud.github.io/d3Network/
# BugReports: https://github.com/christophergandrud/d3Network/issues
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Imports: plyr, rjson, whisker
# Suggests: RCurl
# Packaged: 2015-01-31 12:08:44 UTC; christophergandrud
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2015-01-31 17:29:42
